messages.message:
beginning this week, aihub-sandbox has been taking a super long time (>4hrs) during the undo_turn_down stage and has been regularly timing out. Maybe DM tables need a truncating for it to speed back up?
cc @jtau
https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/aihub-sandbox/info
https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/SAAS-AWS/job/deploy-saas-aws-preprod/32366/

Typically if it's because the tables growing too large, this would hang the write new configs stage and not the undo turn down stage. Undo turn down being stuck means certain services are not able to come up and run successfully.

The upgrade page generally gives a good idea which services are stuck: https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/deployment-manager/upgrade

seems like a variety of issues on this environment preventing services from turning up

<!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> can we triage the issues here
